description:
There are 3 extant major population groups (MPGs) within the Idaho portion of the Snake River Spring-Summer Chinook Salmon Evolutionarily Significant Unit where Chinook currently exhibit natural production. 

Assessments are completed for Chinook salmon populations in the following MPGs:

South Fork Salmon River MPG :

East Fork South Fork Salmon River

Secesh River

South Fork Salmon River

Middle Fork Salmon River MPG:

Bear Valley Creek

Big Creek

Camas Creek

Chamberlain Creek

Loon Creek

Marsh Creek

Middle Fork Salmon River Lower Mainstem

Middle Fork Salmon River Upper Mainstem

Sulphur Creek

Upper Salmon River MPG:

East Fork Salmon River

Lemhi River

Pahsimeroi River

Salmon River Lower Mainstem

Salmon River Upper Mainstem

Valley Creek

Yankee Fork Salmon River
